title: People complaining about seeing a Yasuo every game...
body:
There's a fucking Lee Sin or a Veigar every game for me in norms, lmao.

Where's our draft mode where I can ban these overused champions.

replies.body:
My Yas gripes bring all the boys to the yard, and they're like, it's better than yours.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6AwXKJoKJz4
